dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A MYSTERIOUS WARRIOR treks across the rugged landscape.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Legend tells of a legendary warrior whose Kung Fu skills were the stuff of legend.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The warrior, his identity hidden beneath his flowing robe wide-brimmed hat, gnaws on a staff of bamboo.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He traveled the land in search of worthy foes.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The warrior sits at a table drinking tea and gnawing on h bamboo. The door BLASTS open. The MANCHU GANG rushes in a surrounds him.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (to warrior) I see you like to CHEW! (beat) Maybe you should chew on my FIST!!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Boss punches the table.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The warrior said nothing for his mouth was full. Then, he swallowed.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He swallows.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: And then, he spoke.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (dubbed hero voice) Enough talk. Let's FIGHT! SHASHABOOEY!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: WHAM! The warrior delivers a punch and the whole gang goe flying.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He was so deadly in fact that his enemies would go blind from overexposure to pure awesomeness.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The gang members blindly flail about.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: MY EYES!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: HE'S TOO AWESOME!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ONLOOKERS swoon.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: And ATTRACTIVE!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: How can we repay you??

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: There is no charge for awesomeness, or attractiveness.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ONE HUNDRED ASSASSINS appear and surround the warrior.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The entire bar swells, packed to the rafters with ninjas.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: KABLOOEY!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The roof EXPLODES and a cloud of ninjas erupts into the s Like a tornado, the warrior spins and knocks them all dow

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It mattered not how many foes he faced. They were no match for his bodacity.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The warrior beats up a thousand ninjas, delivering his fi blow while doing a split between two trees.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The warrior stands amongst a field of vanquished foes as rays shine down upon him.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Never before had a panda been so feared... and so loved.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Even the most heroic heroes in all of China, the Furious Five, bowed in respect to this great master.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We should hang out.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Agreed.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: As the Five salute the warrior, he turns to see more band approaching. The Five strike an attack pose. The warrior brandishes a shiny green sword and leaps off the mountain into the sea of bandits.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: But hanging out would have to wait. `Cause when you're facing the ten thousand demons of Demon Mountain, there's only one thing that matters. And that's--

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: In mid air, the Five talk to the warrior in a strange voi

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Po! Get up!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You'll be late for work!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Whu?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Po lands hard on the floor. He tries to clear his head an wake up.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Po! Get up!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We see his room is filled with various kung fu posters (including a poster featuring all of the Five) and souven and a wooden version of the Sword of Heroes (the green sword).

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Po SIGHS.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He attempts to kick himself to his feet but alas, his bel is too worthy a foe.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Po! What are you doing up there?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Uh, nothing!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Po hops to his feet, imitating his Kung Fu action figures

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Monkey! Mantis! Crane! Viper! Tigress! Rowrrrr...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: OUTSIDE on the balcony of the neighboring house, a pig watering flowers stares at Po. Po tries to play it cool a then quickly ducks out of sight.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Po! Let's go! You're late for work!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Coming!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He takes a ninja star from his floor and chucks it at the wall. It bounces off.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He throws the star again, but it bounces off again. He pi it up and heads downstairs. He trips and falls the rest o the way.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Po falls flat on his face on the kitchen floor. A panda- shaped shadow looms over Po.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Sorry, Dad.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Sorry doesn't make the noodles.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Reveal that the shadow is actually caused by a basket bei carried by a small DUCK. This is PO'S DAD. Po gets to wor which is not easy since the kitchen's not really made for panda his size.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What were you doing up there? All that noise.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Oh, nothing. Just had a crazy dream.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He gets back to work.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: About what?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Huh?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The dream. What were you dreaming about?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What was I... eh, I was dreaming about uh... heh...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Push in on Po -- is he going to admit his dream? He hides throwing star behind his back.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Noodles.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: THOK. Dad stops chopping vegetables.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Noodles. You were really dreaming about noodles?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Uh, yeah. What else would I be dreaming about?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Po hands a noodle bowl to a customer, then realizes his throwing star is sitting in it.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (to customer) Careful, that soup is... sharp!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Oh, happy day! My son, finally having the noodle dream!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He throws his arms around Po.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You don't know how long I have been waiting for this moment.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: When Dad pulls out of the hug, Po is now wearing a noodle apron.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: This is a sign, Po!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Po looks at the apron nervously -- what has he gotten him into?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Uh...a sign of what?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You are almost ready to be entrusted with the secret ingredient of my "Secret Ingredient Soup." And then you will fulfill your destiny and take over the restaurant, just as I took it over from my father, who took it over from his father, who won it from a friend in a game of mahjong.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Dad Dad Dad, it was just a dream.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No, it was the dream. We are noodle folk. Broth runs through our veins.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: But Dad, didn't you ever, I dunno, want to do something else? Something besides noodles?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Actually...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Po looks surprised.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: When I was young and crazy...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Dad gets a wistful look in his eyes.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I thought about running away and learning how to make tofu.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: So why didn't you?!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Oh, because it was a stupid dream. Can you imagine, me making tofu? (laughs at the thought) No. We all have our place in this world. Mine is here. And yours is--

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I know. Is here.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No, it's at tables two, five, seven, and twelve.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He loads Po's arms with bowls of soup.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Service with a smile!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A GONG sounds in the distance. Po looks out the window at distant JADE PALACE.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: SLAM ZOOM in towards Palace.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: End next to palace on an old red panda (SHIFU) playing a FLUTE. He is surrounded by the bushes and trees that nest between the Palace buildings.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Wider: We dolly around from behind the bushes. Stealthy d shapes move in the foreground.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Back on Shifu, still playing. He seems oblivious.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Five figures explode from the undergrowth simultaneously, diving on Shifu.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Shifu moves like lightning - the flute now wielded like a staff - he deflects, blocks, dodges, parries - the attack go flying -

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They roll and pick themselves up, turning to face Shifu, is now standing - poised - ready for their next move.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Well done, students... if you were trying to disappoint me.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He uses his flute to correct the Five's technique.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Tigress, you need more ferocity. Monkey, greater speed.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Each of the Five bows respectfully as their name is mentioned.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Crane - height. Viper - subtlety. Mantis--

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Shifu suddenly points the flute at a scared PALACE GOOSE.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Master Shifu!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (impatiently) What?!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (startled) Aah! It's Master Oogway. He wants to see you.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Shifu looks up, concerned.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Shifu strides purposefully down the hallway, which is lin with palace geese.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Candles, incense, and smoke fill the room. The door burst open, the candles flicker. Shifu enters.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Master Oogway? You summoned me.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He bows. Then looks up without unbowing.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Is something wrong?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Reveal Master Oogway... a wise, old tortoise.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Why must something be wrong for me to want to see my old friend?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: So... nothing's wrong?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Well, I didn't say that.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Shifu looks up, concerned. Oogway opens his mouth... and blows out a candle. And another candle. And another.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Finally, Shifu uses his Kung Fu to blow them all out. Oog smiles knowingly.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You were saying?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I have had a vision... Tai Lung will return.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Shifu looks stricken.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Quick, impressionistic images of Shifu battling a large, shadowy figure (Tai Lung).

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Shifu is rattled. He looks at the claw marks that still s the wall and quickly looks away. But he regains his composure.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: That is impossible. He is in prison.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Nothing is impossible.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Shifu makes a split decision.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Zeng!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He comes flying in. Shifu gets in his face.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Fly to Chogun Prison and tell them to double the guards, double their weapons. Double everything! Tai Lung does not leave that prison!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yes, Master Shifu.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The goose flies off, but... SMACK! He hits a column. Then is off. Back on Oogway, as he walks toward camera, away f Shifu.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: One often meets his destiny on the road he takes to avoid it.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We have to do something. We can't just let him march on the valley, and take his revenge! He'll, he'll--

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Oogway looks into the water of the moon pool.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Your mind is like this water, my friend. When it is agitated, it becomes difficult to see. But if you allow it to settle, the answer becomes clear.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Shifu and Oogway stare into the pool. Oogway settles the water, revealing the reflection of an intricately carved dragon clutching a SCROLL in its mouth.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Dragon Scroll...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It is time.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: But who? Who is worthy to be trusted with the secret to limitless power? To become...the Dragon Warrior?!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Dramatic music as we push in on Oogway's face. Then...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I don't know.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Po is serving customers, but has trouble squeezing betwee tables.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Oop...sorry.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hey! Watch it, Po!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Sorry. Suck it up.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He sucks his belly in, but this causes his butt to interf with a bunny family's meal.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ugh!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Oop! Sorry! A thousand pardons.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A couple palace geese put up a poster on the wall and a palace pig hits a tiny gong. This gets Po's attention. He rushes up to the poster.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What?! Master Oogway's choosing the Dragon Warrior! Today!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Customers jump up excitedly.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Everyone! Everyone! Go! Get to the Jade Palace!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Po urges the villagers out the restaurant.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: One of the Five is gonna get the Dragon Scroll!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Customers rush to finish their food.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We've been waiting a thousand years for this! Just take the bowl!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Other customers are finishing their soup.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: One old lady customer slowly counts out coins and puts th on the table.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: This is the greatest day in Kung Fu history! Don't worry about it, just go!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He starts to run.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Po! Where are you going?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Po stops dead in his tracks, busted.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: To the...Jade Palace?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: But you're forgetting your noodle cart! The whole valley will be there, and you'll sell noodles to all of them.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Selling noodles? But Dad, you know, I was kinda thinking maybe I...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yeah?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I was kinda thinking maybe I...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Uh huh?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Po wants to say something to his dad, but he loses his ne

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ...Could also sell the bean buns. They are about to go bad.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: That's my boy! I told you that dream was a sign!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yeah, ha ha, glad I had it.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Throngs of Villagers are streaming into the arena. A coup BUNNY KIDS run by.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yippee!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'm a Kung Fu warrior!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Me too!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Where's Po?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: PAN DOWN a long, long, long, long flight of stairs. Po st at the bottom with his noodle cart, looking up at the daunting task before him.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Po struggles to pull his noodle cart up the stairs.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The sun beats down on Po, but he presses forward. Climbin Climbing.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Po is still struggling up the stairs.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Come on! Come on, ya-- Almost there...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He stops, flopping onto his back to catch his breath.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: WIDEN TO REVEAL he's only made it up seven steps.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What? No! Oh No!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Two Pigs pass by.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Sorry, Po.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We'll bring you back a souvenir.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Po watches as they run up the stairs. His eyes narrow. Th is his heroic moment.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No. I'll bring me back a souvenir.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Po tosses off his hat and apron and begins his ascent up stairs.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Oogway reaches the bottom of the palace stairs and a Pala Pig bangs a gong.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It is an historic day, isn't it, Master Oogway?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yes, and one I feared I would not live to see. Are your students ready?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yes, Master Oogway.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Now know this, old friend. Whomever I choose will not only bring peace to the Valley, but also to you.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: As Shifu contemplates what this could mean, Oogway starts walking off. Shifu quickly joins Oogway as they head towa the roaring crowd below. The pig bangs the gong.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Let the tournament begin!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Throngs of Villagers are streaming into the arena.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Po gasps for air as he hoists himself over the last step, laughing victoriously.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (out of breath) Yeah!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The doors to the palace arena begin to close.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Oh no! No no no! Wait! I'm coming!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Po runs to the entrance and proceeds to bang on the door.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hey! Open the door!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: DRUMS inside drown out Po's pounding. He yells.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Let me in!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Inside, spectators' screams drown out Po's yelling.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Po panics for a beat and then finds a window. He jumps an weakly struggles to pull himself up.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Po struggles to peek through the window.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Citizens of the Valley of Peace! It is my great honor to present to you... Tigress! Viper! Crane! Monkey! Mantis! The Furious Five!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Five jump into the middle of the ring.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Furious Five!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Po manages a brief glimpse of the Five before a gust of w knocks Po to the ground and shuts the window.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Warriors prepare!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Po runs over to a crack in the wall.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Peeky-hole!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ready for battle!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Inside the arena, Po catches a glimpse of Crane as he spr his wings.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yeah! Woo! The Thousand Tongues of Fire!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: One of the spectators walks in front of Po, cutting off h view.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Whoa! Look at that.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hey, get out of the way!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Po backs up to get a better look at Crane in the sky and accidentally falls down the stairs.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Po climbs back up and drops his head -- he missed it.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Po tries karate chopping the door open...to no avail. He slumps to the ground.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ow...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Po attempts a pole vault, but falls on his back. The pole whips around and hits him into the arena wall.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Po rigs a catapult, only to get clobbered by it. The crow CHEERS.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Po sits atop the stairs. Alone.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: And finally...Master Tigress!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Po snaps to attention.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Po pulls on a rope tied to a tree.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: And believe me citizens, you have not seen anything yet!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I KNOW!!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Master Tigress! Face Iron Ox and his Blades of Death!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Tigress sets up to deliver her move.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Po launches himself up above the fence, gets a peek at Tigress, then falls out of view just as she does her move

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Po lands outside the arena in a fireworks tent.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Oogway senses something. He raises his hand and the crowd hushes.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I sense the Dragon Warrior is among us.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Shifu motions for the Five to gather in the center of the ring.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Citizens of the Valley of Peace! Master Oogway will now choose... the Dragon Warrior!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Po comes to.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Huh? Oh no! Wait!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He sees the fireworks and has an idea.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yeah!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Oogway closes his eyes and raises his hand as ceremonial DRUMS start to play.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Po struggles with something, his back turned to us. Revea has tied a load of fireworks to a chair. He hops on and lights the fuse.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Po?!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Po's Dad rushes over and tries to blow out the fuse.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What are you doing?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What does it look like I'm doing? Stop! Stop! I'm going to see the Dragon Warrior!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: But I don't understand. You finally had the noodle dream.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Po looks uneasy.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I lied. I don't dream about noodles, Dad!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He looks at the fuse... almost all gone... Po holds onto chair for dear life, closes his eyes, and braces himself liftoff.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I love kung fuuuuuuuuuuuuuuuuu-

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Po finally opens his eyes...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He's still on the ground. The fuse was a dud. Po falls fa first into the dirt. He looks away, embarrassed. Po's Dad holds out his apron.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Come on, son. Let's get back to work.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Okay.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Po sighs, starts to reach for the apron, then-- BOOM! The rockets ignite, propelling Po into the stadium wall.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Oh! Come back!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Po's rocket chair blasts him into the sky amid a shower o fireworks.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Oooh! Aaahh!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Po climbs up and up...until the rockets die out and the c loses power...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Uh oh...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Oogway's arm sweeps down the line of the expectant Five.. falls towards the center of the ring...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The tension builds as the Five wait to see who will be picked. Then... SMASH!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Po lands and kicks up a huge dirt cloud, obscuring the ri

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: PO POV: He sees the Five looking down at him, appalled. P comes round slowly, getting his bearings. He looks around sees Oogway. Strangely, the old turtle is smiling.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What's going on? Where...uh? What are you pointing--?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He looks up. An awful realization starts to dawn. Po GULP He is desperately embarrassed.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Oh. Okay. Sorry. I just wanted to see who the Dragon Warrior was.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He tries to shuffle his butt out of there, mumbling apologies.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: How interesting.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Master, are you pointing at...me?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Him.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Who--?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Po tries moving out of the way of Oogway's finger, but it keeps following him.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Me?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Oogway grabs Po's hand and holds it up for all to see.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The universe has brought us the Dragon Warrior!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What??

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What???

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: WHAT????

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The pig bangs the gong.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The crowd goes wild! They cheer! They scream! Confetti fa A palanquin is carried past Shifu.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Stop! Wait! Who told you to--?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Po stands there, utterly stunned, his mouth hanging open. is abruptly lifted up out of shot.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Cut to the Palace Geese straining.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Po is being lifted with great effort on the palanquin. He carried off. Shifu elbows his way urgently through the thronging crowd to get to Oogway.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Master Oogway, wait! That flabby panda can't possibly be the answer to... our problem. You were about to point at Tigress. That thing fell in front of her. That was just an accident!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: There are no accidents.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Oogway smiles benignly as we hear an off-screen CRASH!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The camera adjusts to reveal the palanquin has collapsed under Po.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Shifu looks at Oogway. Oogway just smiles.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A squad of burly pigs rushes in and hoists Po, the palanq and the Geese onto their shoulders, and they head off for Jade Palace. Stunned, Shifu watches them go.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Behind him, the Five approach and bow.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Forgive us, Master. We have failed you.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Shifu spins around.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No. If the panda has not quit by morning, then I will have failed you.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Confetti flutters through the air as the celebration continues around them.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A huge prison is carved into the side of a frozen mountai Fifteen stories of iron and rock. No windows. One door -- locked, bolted and sealed tight. Rhinoceros guards in arm patrol the perimeter.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Zeng, the palace goose, flies into frame and a Rhino Sent spots him in the distance. He lands, sliding on the ice a crashing into the gate. The rhinos point their spears at

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Wait wait wait! I bring a message from Master Shifu.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: CLANG! The doors creak open. The terrified goose peers in

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What?!?! (reading) "Double the guard?! Extra precautions?! Your prison may not be adequate!"

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Goose is quaking in fear. Stern Rhinos surround him, staring daggers at him. The Commander snaps the scroll sh

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You doubt my prison's security?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Absolutely not. (then) Shifu does. I'm just the messenger.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'll give you a message for your Master Shifu.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Escape from Chogun Prison is impossible!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Goose is awed by the cavernous prison.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Whoa.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The goose looks over the bridge's edge. The prison goes d a long ways. The commander hits the goose on the back.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Impressive, isn't it?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A feather from the goose drifts down the prison.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yes, very impressive. It's VERY impressive.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: One way in, one way out, one thousand guards, and one prisoner.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yes, except that prisoner is Tai Lung...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Take us down.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Several guard rhinos winch the goose and the commander do The commander grabs the chain and shakes the elevator, tr to scare the goose.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What are you doing?!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The commander just laughs. The elevator finally lands, sending an echo throughout the prison.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A number of doors unlock, one after the other. Finally, a drawbridge is lowered out onto an island.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Oh my...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Behold, Tai Lung.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'll um...I'm just gonna wait right here.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It's nothing to worry about. It's perfectly safe.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He shoves the goose out ahead of him.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Oof!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Crossbows! At the ready!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Crossbows?!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They approach TAI LUNG, a giant, muscular snow leopard bo in a giant piece of tortoise shell armor and chains. He barely registers signs of life. The commander walks right to him.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hey, tough guy, did you hear? Oogway's finally gonna give someone the Dragon Scroll and it's not gonna be you!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The goose can't believe it.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What are you doing?! Don't get him mad.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What's he gonna do about it? I've got him completely immobilized.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Commander stomps on Tai Lung's tail. We hear a crunch The goose flinches. But Tai Lung does not react.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Awww. Did I step on the witty kitty's tail? Awww.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Tai Lung doesn't move. His eyes stare coldly straight ahe

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'm good. I've seen enough. I'm gonna tell Shifu he's got nothing to worry about.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No, he doesn't.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Okay, I'll tell him that. Can we please go now?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Commander starts to walk back to the elevator. The go hurries after him.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The goose's feather flutters into frame. We follow the feather as it lands right in front of Tai Lung.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: HIS EYES OPEN. Tai Lung grabs the feather with his tail.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The palace doors open to reveal Po on the palanquin, hund of villagers behind him.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (chanting) Dragon Warrior! Dragon Warrior!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Po is ushered in and the doors close. He is alone. He run back to the closed palace doors.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Wait a second! Hello? Uh...I think there's been a slight mistake. Everyone seems to think that I'm, uh...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Po finally realizes where he is.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Whoa. The Sacred Hall of Warriors. No way! Would you look at this place!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He rushes up to a display of armor.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (GASP) Master Flying Rhino's Armor! With authentic battle damage!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He rushes up to a green sword, making sure not to touch i

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (GASP) The Sword of Heroes! Said to be so sharp you can cut yourself just by looking-- OW!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He stares at a black sopt on the wall.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Invisible Trident of Destiny!?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He admires a painting.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I've only seen paintings of that painting...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Po runs around the room, amazed by all the ancient kung f artifacts. Something special catches Po's eye.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (loudly) Nooo! Ohhhh!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He runs over to it.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The legendary Urn of Whispering Warriors! Said to contain the souls of the entire Tenshu army. (calling into vase) Hellooo?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Have you finished sight-seeing?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Po GASPS.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (to vase) Sorry. I should've come to see you first.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: My patience is wearing thin.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (to vase) Oh. Well, I mean, it's not like you were going anywhere.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Would you turn around?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Sure.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Po turns and sees Shifu.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hey, how's it going?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Po turns back to the vase.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (to vase) Now how do you get five thousand-- (cutting himself off) Master Shifu!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Po bumps the vase which falls and BREAKS.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Someone...broke that. But I'm gonna fix it. Do you have some glue?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The vase debris screams as Po tries to pick up the pieces

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ow! Ooh. Splinter.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Po fumbles around. Shifu looks irked.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: So you're the legendary Dragon Warrior. Hmmm?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Uh...I guess so?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Shifu smiles and shakes his head.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Wrong! You are not the Dragon Warrior. You will never be the Dragon Warrior until you have learned the secret of the Dragon Scroll.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He points to a dragon on the ceiling with a single scroll its mouth.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (in awe) Whoa. (then) So how does this work? You have a ladder or trampoline or...?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You think it's that easy? That I am just going to hand you the secret to limitless power?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No, I...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: One must first master the highest level of kung fu. And that is clearly impossible if that one is someone like you.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Someone like me?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Shifu walks around Po - pointing out his weaknesses.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yes. Look at you...this fat butt.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Shifu HITS Po on the butt with his staff.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Flabby arms...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Those are sensitive in the flabby parts.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Shifu SWATS Po on the arm with his staff.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: And this ridiculous belly.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Shifu HITS Po in the belly with his staff.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hey...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: --and utter disregard for personal hygiene.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (pointing at Shifu) Now wait a minute. That's a little uncalled-for.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Don't stand that close...I can smell your breath.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Listen...Oogway said that I was the-

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Shifu pinches Po's outstretched digit.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (gasp) The Wuxi Finger Hold?! Not the Wuxi Finger Hold!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (sly) Oh, you know this hold?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: DevelopedbyMasterWuxiInTheThirdDyna sty-- YES.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Oh, then you must know what happens when I flex my pinky.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Po nervously eyes his finger locked in Shifu's grip and n quickly.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No no no!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You know the hardest part of this? The hardest part is cleaning up afterwards...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Okay! Okay! Take it easy...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Now listen closely, panda. Oogway may have picked you, but when I'm through with you, I promise you, you're going to wish he hadn't. Are we clear?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yeah, we're clear. We're clear. We are so clear.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Good. I can't wait to get started.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The doors open, revealing Po nursing his wounded finger. Shifu steps out of the way and Po's face goes into shock. Five are performing death-defying kung fu moves in the training hall. Tigress smashes a swinging, spiked ball of wood. ANGLE ON AN AWESTRUCK PO, as shards of wood blast i his face. Po is intimidated and overwhelmed.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Shifu scowls at Po.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Let's begin.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He gestures to the gauntlet. Po's eyes go wide.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Wait wait wait...What? Now?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yes...now. Unless you think the great Oogway was wrong, and you are not the Dragon Warrior.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Oh, okay. Well-- I don't know if I can do all of those moves.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Shifu walks away and Po half-heartedly follows.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Well, if we don't try, we'll never know will we?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Uh, yeah. It's just, maybe we can find something more suited to my level.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: And what level is that?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Well, ya know...I'm not a master, but uh, let's just start at zero, level zero.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: There is no such thing as level zero.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hey! Maybe I can start with that.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Po points at a rather friendly-looking dummy.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: That? We use that for training children. And for propping the door open when it's hot. But if you insist...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Relieved, Po turns to the dummy. The Five gather around h

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Whoa. The Furious Five. You're so much bigger than your action figures -- except for you, Mantis. You're about the same.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Mantis gives him a look.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Go ahead, panda. Show us what you can do.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Um, are they gonna watch? Or should I just wait until they get back to work or something...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hit it.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ok. I mean, I just ate. So I'm still digesting... So my kung fu might not be as good as later on.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Just hit it.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Po psyches himself up, doing some Jack Fu.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Alright. Whatcha got? You got nothing cause I got it right here. You picking on my friends? Get ready to feel the thunder. I'm comin' at him with the crazy feet. Whatcha gonna do about my crazy feet? I'm a blur. I'm a blur. You never seen bear style, you only seen praying Mantis! OR... I could come at you Monkey style. OR... I'm comin' at ya snikity-snake.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Shifu and the Five stare at Po, perplexed.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Would you hit it!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Alright...alright.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Po lightly hits the dummy and it rocks back into place.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Why don't you try again?   A little harder...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Po punches it again, knocking it all the way backwards. H turns to Shifu, smug.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: How's tha--

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: WHAP! The dummy rights itself and smacks Po. Totally daze Po trips and stumbles his way through the obstacle course The Five instinctively step forward to help Po, but Shifu holds up his hand to stop them.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ow, that hurts.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A spiky tethered ball sends Po flying into the jade turtl exercise, where it rattles him around.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (to the Five) This'll be easier than I thought.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Back to Po in the turtle bowl.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Feeling a little nauseous.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The turtle spills him out and he stumbles into the army o wooden dummies.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ow, those are hard! Ooh! I think I...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The last dummy whaps him in the crotch and everything bec still.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Oooohoohoo...my tenders.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He struggles to get on his feet, takes one step and reach out to a dummy arm...and immediately gets pummeled all ov again. Po comes out the other side battered and bruised a finds he is standing on the floor that shoots out bursts flame. We see reflections of fire on the Five and Shifu a gets singed. He comes crawling into frame.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: How did I do?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: There is now a level zero.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Five are walking to the bunkhouse, which sits high on hill.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: There's no words.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No denying that.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I don't understand what Master Oogway was thinking. The poor guy's just gonna get himself killed.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (mocking) He is so mighty! The Dragon Warrior fell out of the sky on a ball of fire.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: When he walks, the very ground shakes!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: One would think that Master Oogway would choose someone who actually knew Kung Fu.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yeah, or could at least touch his toes.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Or even see his toes.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: As the others walk off, we reveal Po, who unbeknownst to has been walking behind them this whole time, hearing everything.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He attempts to look at his toes but just sees gut. He lif up his stomach, leans forward... leans... leans... and fa over.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He gets up and watches them go inside. He sighs.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Po peeks around the corner.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Okay.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He tip-toes into the hall.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: SQUEAK. The floorboards strain beneath him. SQUEAK.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (whispering) Great.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Po takes a gentle step. CRE-E-E-A-AA--CHUNK! Po's foot go through the floor. Po tries to recover. SQUEAK-SQUEAK-SQU THUNK! Po rolls his ankle and stumbles through a bedroom door.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Crane is staring back at him.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Oh hey...hi. You're up.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Am now.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I was just uh... Some day huh? That kung fu stuff is hard work, right? Your biceps sore?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Crane looks at his wing.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Um...I've had a long and rather disappointing day, so uh...yeah, I should probably get to sleep now.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yeah yeah yeah, of course.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (relieved) Okay, thanks.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It's just...I'm such a big fan.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Oop.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You guys were totally amazing at the Battle of Weeping River. Outnumbered a thousand to one, but you didn't stop, and then you just... HI-YAH!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Po does a spastic series of Kung Fu moves. We hear a RIP, reveal that he's kicked his foot through the paper wall.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ooo, sorry about that.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Look, you don't belong here.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Po looks stung to be hearing this from one of his heroes.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I know. I know. You're right. I just - my whole life I've dreamed of-

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Crane stops Po before he embarrasses himself even more.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No no no... I meant you don't belong here. I mean, in this room. This is my room. Property of Crane.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Po is mortified, but covers.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Oh, okay. Right right. Yeah, you want to get to sleep.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yeah.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'm keepin' you up. We got big things tomorrow. Alright. You're awesome. Last thing I'm gonna say. Okay. Bye bye.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Po shuts the door. Crane sighs. The door flies open. Po enters with an eager smile.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What was that?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I didn't say anything.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Okay. Alright. Goodnight. Sleep well.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Po backs out into the hall and closes the door.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Seemed a little bit awkward.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Po turns and walks down the hall to find a vacant room. C CREAK.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Tigress opens the door behind him. Po winces.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Master Tigress! Didn't mean to wake you. Just uh...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You don't belong here.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Uh, yeah, yeah. Of course. This is your room.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I mean...you don't belong in the Jade Palace. You're a disgrace to Kung Fu, and if you have any respect for who we are and what we do, you will be gone by morning.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She closes the door on Po, who slumps sadly.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Big fan...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A dejected Po stands under a peach tree in the moonlight. Oogway approaches.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I see you have found the Sacred Peach Tree of Heavenly Wisdom.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Po spins around, his face dripping with peach juice.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (mouth full) Is that what this is? I am so sorry. I thought it was just a regular peach tree.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I understand. You eat when you are upset.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Upset? I'm not upset. What makes you think I'm upset?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: So why are you upset?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Po sighs, there's no use trying to lie to Oogway.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I probably sucked more today than anyone in the history of kung fu, in the history of China, in the history of sucking.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Probably.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: And the Five... man, you should have seen them, they totally hate me.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Totally.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: How's Shifu ever going to turn me into the Dragon Warrior? I mean, I'm not like The Five. I've got no claws, no wings, no venom. Even Mantis has those... (he imitates a mantis' front legs) ...thingies. Maybe I should just quit and go back to making noodles.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Quit, don't quit. Noodles, don't noodles.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Po looks confused.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You are too concerned with what was and what will be. There is a saying: Yesterday is history, tomorrow is a mystery, but today is a gift. That is why it is called the present.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Oogway hits the tree with his staff as he walks away and peach falls into Po's open hand.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Using the goose's feather to pick the lock, Tai Lung BURS free from his armor.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: An ALARM RINGS OUT!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Commander runs to the ledge, the Goose right behind h

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What's happening?!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Goose looks over the edge and sees Tai Lung at the bo of the pit.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Tai Lung struggles with his shackles.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Fire Crossbows!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Tai Lung uses the incoming spears to break his shackles a then manages to kick the spears back up into the walls, creating a makeshift staircase.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Tai Lung is free! I must warn Shifu!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Commander shuts the Goose up.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You're not going anywhere. And neither is he.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Let go of me!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (to guards) Bring it up!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The winch turns and the elevator starts to rise. A rhino guard tries to reach it, but just misses.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Wait! Bring it back!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He's coming this way!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He won't get far. (to guards) Archers!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Leaping across the spears, Tai Lung catches the elevator the volley of arrows flies down past him.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The guards cut the rope and the elevator crashes back dow the bottom of the pit.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Tai Lung swings up from the bottom of the elevator house catches the guards by surprise. He grabs the chain and ju over the edge and swings around, launching himself up to next tier, disappearing into the shadows.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Tai Lung lands on a bridge, fights his way through, final reaching the top tier where the Commander and the rest of Rhino army await.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We're dead. So very, very dead.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Commander hushes the Goose.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (to Goose) Heh heh...not yet we're not! Now!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Archers set off charges on the ceiling. Massive stalactit crash down and the bridge begins to crumble. Tai Lung lea across the crumbling debris and attempts one last huge ju towards the Commander. But he falls short, claws scraping sparking against the rock wall. The Commander laughs maniacally.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: On his way down, Tai Lung looks up and sees a fuse burnin down to the last group of explosives. He leaps across the raining debris up to the ceiling of the cavern.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Grabbing a hold of the dynamite, Tai Lung falls and sling ahead of him at the guards.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Can we run now?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yes.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: KA-THOOM! The door blasts open and Rhinos go flying everywhere.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: WHUMP. The Goose hits the ground. The commander's horn prosthetic falls in front of him.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Nuuu... Urggg...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Tai Lung picks up the Goose by the throat.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: URRK!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'm glad Shifu sent you. I was beginning to think I had been forgotten.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: With a creepy tenderness, Tai Lung smooths the Goose's ruffled feathers.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Fly back there and tell them...the real Dragon Warrior is coming home.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Tai Lung throws the Goose into the air and he flutters of Lightning strikes.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: CLOSE-UP of a gong being struck.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Shifu enters the hallway of the bunkhouse. The Five burst of their rooms and land, ready for inspection.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Good morning master!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: One door remains closed.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Panda! Panda, wake up!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He slides open Po's door. The room is empty.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (satisfied) Hmm. He's quit.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Shifu walks with a bit more energy.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What do we do now, Master? With the panda gone, who will be the Dragon Warrior?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: All we can do is resume our training and trust that in time, the true Dragon Warrior will be revealed.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Shifu enters the training hall, only to find himself face face with Po's butt. Shifu and the Five are taken aback.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What are you doing here?!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Reveal Po is in the middle of the floor, his legs spread apart. Po looks back over his shoulder to see Shifu and t Five enter the hall.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hey! Huh... Good morning, Master! I thought I'd warm up a little.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You're stuck.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Stuck?! Whaa? Pfft... stuck... Yeah, I'm stuck.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (to Crane) Help him.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Crane approaches Po.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Oh dear.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Crane gingerly grabs Po's waistband and attempts to pull up by flapping his wings.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Maybe on three. One. Two-

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Crane pulls him up and Po flops onto his back.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Threeeee. Thank you.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Don't mention it.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No really, I appreci--

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: --EVER.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You actually thought you could learn to do a full split in one night? It takes years to develop one's flexibility and years longer to apply it in combat.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Shifu flings two boards into the air. Instantly, Tigress leaps up and executes a perfect split kick. Po is awestru As Tigress lands, the broken chunks of board land all aro Po, knocking him on the head.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Po collects a piece of splintered board as a souvenir. Sh notices and steps forward.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Put that down! The only souvenirs we collect here are bloody knuckles and broken bones.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yeah, excellent!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He laughs excitedly and salutes Shifu.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Let's get started.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Shifu snaps his fingers. Viper and Po face off.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Are you ready?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I was born ready--

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Viper lashes her tail around Po's wrist, wrenches his arm back, flings him into the air and brings him crashing bac down on his head.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Eaghhh...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'm sorry, brother! I thought you said you were ready!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: That was awesome! Let's go again. (salutes)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Shifu snaps.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Monkey twirls a bamboo staff. He lunges at Po who takes a comical beating.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Shifu snaps.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Po and Crane prepare to spar atop the turtle bowl. CRASH. falls in and is tossed around like a sack of soup.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Shifu snaps.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We see a series of shots of Po falling on his face at the hands of some invisible opponent, who turns out to be... Mantis.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Shifu smiles. Flat on his back, Po manages a salute. Shif has had it.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I've been taking it easy on you, panda, but no more! Your next opponent... will be me.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Po looks excited.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Alright! Let's go!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Five exchange worried looks.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (to Po) Step forth.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Po doesn't even finish the step as Shifu whirls him aroun and throws him to the floor pinning his arm behind him.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The true path to victory is to find your opponent's weakness and make him suffer for it.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (delighted) Oh, yeah!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Shifu whips Po around again.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: To take his strength and use it against him.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Again, this time Shifu holds Po by the nose.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: --until he finally falls, or quits.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Po is totally inspired.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: But a real warrior never quits. Don't worry, Master, I will never quit!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: At his breaking point, Shifu flings Po into the air and t leaps at him with a flying kick.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Po crashes out of the door and tumbles down the steps.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Five watch him fall.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: If he's smart, he won't come back up those steps.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: But he will.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He's not gonna quit, is he?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He's not gonna quit bouncin', I'll tell ya that.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Cut WIDE as Po continues to tumble.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Close on Po, who grimaces.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Aaaoo...whoohoo...EEEee...hee- hee... I thought you said acupuncture would make me feel better.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Mantis pops up from behind Po holding a handful of needle and sticks Po again.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Trust me, it will. It's just not easy finding the right nerve points under all this--

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Fat?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Fur, I was gonna say fur.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Sure you were.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Who am I to judge a warrior based on his size? I mean -- look at me.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Po looks for Mantis...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'm over here.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ...But Mantis is now on his other shoulder. He jabs anoth needle into Po.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ow!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Maybe you should take a look at this again.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Viper is holding a diagram of acupuncture meridians (onto which someone has overlaid a drawing of a panda.)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (re: diagram) Oh! Okay.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Quick cuts to Monkey meditating in his room and Crane doi calligraphy in his. Po's yelps distract them.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ow! Don't... (laughing) Stop it, stop-- Yow! I know Master Shifu's trying to inspire me and all, but if I didn't know any better, I'd say he was trying to get rid of me.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Po chuckles. The others look at each other and chuckle awkwardly.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I know he can seem kind of heartless--

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He violently jabs another needle in Po.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: But, ya know, he wasn't always like that.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: According to legend, there was once a time when Master Shifu actually used to smile.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yes.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Cut to Tigress out in the hallway. She can hear them talk

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: But that was before...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Before what?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Tigress enters.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Before Tai Lung.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Crane's shadow is silhouetted on the wall.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Uh yeah, we're not really supposed to talk about him.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Well, if he's going to stay here, he should know.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (trying to ease the tension) Guys, guys. I know about Tai Lung.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Tigress turns to Po.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He was a student, the first ever to master the thousand...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Tigress approaches Po and leans in towards him.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (nervously trailing off) ...scrolls of... kung fu... and... then he turned bad... and now he's in jail.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Tigress shakes her head at the panda's ignorance.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He wasn't just a student.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: FLASHBACK. Shifu peeks out of the Training Hall and finds baby leopard cub on the steps.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Shifu found him as a cub. And he raised him as a son.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Baby Tai Lung pulls on Shifu's whiskers.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ...and when the boy showed talent in Kung Fu...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Baby Tai Lung punches the training dummy across the floor

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ...Shifu trained him.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Shifu teaches Baby Tai Lung how to punch.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He believed in him. He told him he was destined for greatness.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hard cut to a full-grown Tai Lung demolishing a training dummy.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It was never enough for Tai Lung. He wanted the Dragon Scroll. But Oogway saw darkness in his heart and refused. Outraged, Tai Lung laid waste to the valley. He tried to take the scroll by force. And Shifu had to destroy what he had created.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Tai Lung ransacks a village on his way up to the Jade Pal He crashes through the doors, running towards a waiting S and Oogway.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Shifu leaps at Tai Lung to deliver a kick.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: But how could he?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Seeing only baby Tai Lung running towards him, Shifu pull his kick short. Tai Lung counters with a devastating stri and Shifu crashes to the ground holding his broken leg.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Tai Lung leaps for the scroll, but Oogway stops him with strikes at his pressure points. He falls to the ground in heap.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Shifu loved Tai Lung like he'd never loved anyone before...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Young Tigress in the training hall strikes the dummy in t same manner as Tai Lung. Shifu corrects her form. Nothing more. Young Tigress looks crestfallen.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ...or since.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The sad, young Tigress cross-dissolves to adult Tigress.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Everyone is quiet in the moment.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: And now he has a chance to make things right, to train the true Dragon Warrior. And he's stuck with you: a big, fat panda who treats it like a joke.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Po makes a googly-eyed face.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Doieeeee...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (charging at Po) Oh! That is it!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Mantis pops up and halts Tigress.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Wait! My fault! I accidentally tweaked his facial nerve.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Po falls face first to the floor, revealing his back is covered with needles.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: And may have also stopped his heart.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Shifu is sitting in meditation, fidgeting incessantly.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Inner peace. Inner peace. Inner peace.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He finally opens one eye.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Would whoever is making that flapping sound, quiet down!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Satisfied with the silence, Shifu nods and resumes his meditation.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Inner...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: BOOM. Zeng drops in from the ceiling.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Oh, Zeng. Excellent. I could use some good news right now.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Uh...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Oogway stands under the peach tree, deep in thought. Shif rushes in, emerging from the mist, extremely agitated.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Master! Master!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hmmm?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (out of breath) I have-- it's-- it's very bad news.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ah, Shifu. There is just news. There is no good or bad.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Master, your vision...your vision was right. Tai Lung has broken out of prison. He's on his way!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: That is bad news...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He turns to face Shifu and stares at him, eyebrow raised.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ...If you do not believe that the Dragon Warrior can stop him.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The panda? Master, that panda is not the Dragon Warrior.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He wasn't even meant to be here -- it was an accident!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: There are no accidents.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yes, I know. You've said that already. Twice.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Well, that was no accident either.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Thrice.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: My old friend, the panda will never fulfill his destiny, nor you yours, until you let go of the illusion of control.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Illusion?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yeah. Look at this tree, Shifu. I cannot make it blossom when it suits me, nor make it bear fruit before its time.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: But there are things we can control.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Shifu kicks the tree and a peach falls to his feet.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I can control when the fruit will fall.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A peach falls on his head and Oogway chuckles. Shifu toss the peach in the air, leaps up, and splits it with a chop

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: And I can control--

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Shifu punches the ground, creating a hole and places the in it.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: --where to plant the seed. That is no illusion, Master.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ah, yes. But no matter what you do, that seed will grow to be a peach tree. You may wish for an apple, or an orange... but you will get a peach.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: But a peach cannot defeat Tai Lung!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Maybe it can. If you are willing to guide it, to nurture it. To believe in it.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Oogway covers the seed with dirt.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: But how? How? I need your help, Master.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No, you just need to believe. Promise me, Shifu. Promise me you will believe.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I... I will try.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Oogway smiles, then glances up at the sky, then back down Shifu.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Good. My time has come. You must continue your journey without me.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He hands his staff to a confused Shifu.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What... what are you..?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Oogway backs away into the swirling fog.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Master, you can't leave me!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The petals surround Oogway as he approaches the cliff's e

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You must believe.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Master!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Shifu runs after him. Oogway is engulfed by peach blossom As the winds settle, Shifu is revealed standing at the ed of a cliff.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Oogway is gone.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We pan across to the bunkhouse.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ...So I'm like, fine, you may be a wolf, you may be the scariest bandit in Haijin Province...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Reveal Po is cooking for the Five.   He chops some veggie air.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ...but you're a lousy tipper.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (incredulous) Really? So... how'd you get out of there alive?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I mean, I didn't actually say that, but I thought it... in my mind.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Po flips some bowls and expertly lines them up on his arm ladles soup into them.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (covering) If he... could read my mind, he'd have been like, "What?" (then) Order up!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Po looks around expectantly and the Five (minus Tigress) in.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hope you like it.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: This is really good.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (bashful) No, c'mon.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You should try my dad's secret ingredient soup. He actually knows the secret ingredient.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What are you talking about? This is amazing.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Wow, you're a really good cook.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I wish my mouth was bigger.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The others laugh. But not Tigress.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Tigress, you gotta try this.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Tigress looks up from her meal.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It is said that the Dragon Warrior can survive for months at a time on nothing but the dew of a single gingko leaf and the energy of the universe.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: On the others for a beat. Then Po shrugs.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I guess my body doesn't know it's the Dragon Warrior yet. I'm gonna need a lot more than dew. And, uh, universe juice.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Po laughs. He picks up his bowl and takes a giant gulp. W he lowers the bowl, we see a noodle hanging from his face it looks like a moustache. Mantis snickers.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Oh, nothing... Master Shifu!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The rest start laughing. Po realizes he's wearing a noodl moustache. He plays it up.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (imitating Shifu) You will never be the Dragon Warrior, unless you lose five hundred pounds and brush your teeth!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Five LAUGH.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (imitating Shifu) What is that noise you're making? Laughter? I never heard of it!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Five keep LAUGHING. Po reaches over and grabs two emp bowls and holds them up like ears.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (imitating Shifu) Work hard, Panda. And maybe, someday... you will have ears like mine.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
