dialogues.text: As the rest of the Five laugh, Tigress sneaks a moment to smell Po's soup. Leaning towards the bowl, she suddenly l up and stops. The Five also look up and stop laughing.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Reveal Shifu has entered behind Po. He is holding Oogway' staff.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (normal) Ears. It's not working for you? I thought they were pretty good.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Po looks at the stone-faced Five. Tigress jumps to her fe

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It's Shifu.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Of course it's Shifu. What do you think I'm doing?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He finally notices Shifu standing there, doing a slow bur Embarrassed, he places the soup bowls on his chest like a bra.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ooh! Master Shifu!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Po slurps up the noodle moustache. Monkey can't help but snicker.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You think this is funny? Tai Lung has escaped from prison and you're acting like children!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He is coming for the Dragon Scroll, and you are the only one who can stop him.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The bowls fall off. A beat as this sinks in... then Po st to laugh.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: And here I am saying you got no sense of humor. I'm gonna stop Tai...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Shifu just stares at him, deadly serious.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What? You're serious? And I have to-- uh, Master Oogway will stop him! He did it before, he'll do it again.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Oogway cannot, not anymore.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They notice Shifu holding Oogway's staff. They know what means. They are saddened by the news.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Our only hope is the Dragon Warrior.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The panda?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yes, the panda!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Master, please. Let us stop Tai Lung. This is what you've trained us for.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No! It is not your destiny to defeat Tai Lung. It is his.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He dramatically points at Po... but Po is gone.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Where'd he go?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Shifu throws up his hands in frustration and heads after

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Super wide shot as Po runs away from the compound. Closer he continues running. He checks over his shoulder, turns back... Shifu lands right in front of him.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You cannot leave! A real warrior never quits!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Watch me!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He tries to maneuver around Shifu, but is redirected back

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Come on! How am I supposed to beat Tai Lung? I can't even beat you to the stairs.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You will beat him because you are the Dragon Warrior!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He pushes Po back with the staff.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ow! You don't believe that! You never believed that! From the first moment I got here, you've been trying to get rid of me.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Shifu pokes him again, this time causing Po to fall on hi back.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yes. I was. But now I ask you to trust in your master as I have come to trust in mine.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You're not my master. And I'm not the Dragon Warrior.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Po shoves the staff away and gets up.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Then why didn't you quit? You knew I was trying to get rid of you, and yet you stayed.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yeah, I stayed. I stayed because every time you threw a brick at my head or said I smelled, it hurt. But it could never hurt more than it did every day of my life just being me.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Po looks down at the Valley, then turns back to Shifu.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I stayed because I thought if anyone could change me, could make me... not me, it was you. The greatest kung fu teacher in all of China.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: But I can change you! I can turn you into the Dragon Warrior! And I will!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: C'mon, Tai Lung is on his way here right now. And even if it takes him a hundred years to get here, how are you gonna change this... (indicate belly) ...into the Dragon Warrior? How? How? How?!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: In frustration, Shifu yells out the answer.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I don't know!!! (then, resigned) I don't know.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: That's what I thought.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Shifu walks away, leaving the path open to Po.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Tigress stands in the moonlight outside the palace. She h seen what just transpired between Shifu and Po.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She turns away, a look of resolve on her face... and LEAP

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She flies through the air, finally landing on a rooftop i the valley below. She looks back up at the palace.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: This is what you trained me for.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She takes off running.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The other four are right behind her.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Tigress!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She keeps going and they give chase.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Don't try and stop me!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The chase continues through the village.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We're not trying to stop you!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We're coming with you!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Then...the others join her. Tigress smiles. They leap off into the night.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Night dissolves to dawn. Shifu sits under the peach tree. stirs, hearing KUNG FU NOISES from the training hall. He to investigate.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Shifu looks inside -- it's empty. The NOISES continue fro somewhere else -- the bunkhouse.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: As Shifu turns the corner he sees Po's shadow as he perfo some amazing Kung Fu.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Entering the kitchen, Shifu finds Po is stuffing his face with food. Seeing Shifu, he stops mid-munch.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: In silence they eye each other. Shifu surveys the room -- broken lock, smashed doors, unhinged cabinets. Po belches

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (mouth full) What? I eat when I'm upset, okay?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Shifu gets a glimmer in his eye. He has an idea.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Oh, no need to explain. I just thought you might be Monkey -- he hides his almond cookies on the top shelf.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Shifu calmly exits and hides just outside the doorway, waiting to see if his hunch is correct.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: KLUMP! KLONK! THUNK! Shifu peeks back inside and finds Po perched atop the high shelves jamming more cookies into h mouth. Po notices Shifu walking back in.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (mouth full) Don't tell Monkey.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He glances back down at Shifu, whose disbelief turns to a wise smile.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Look at you.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yeah, I know. I disgust you.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No no, I mean... how did you get up there?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I don't know. I guess I-- I don't know. I was getting a cookie...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He looks at the cookie and then can't help but eat it.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: And yet you are ten feet off the ground and have done a perfect split.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No, this... this is just an accident.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He and Po stare at each other for a beat. Then... WHOOMP! slips and crashes to the kitchen floor. A cookie rolls ov to Shifu. He picks it up.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: There are no accidents. Come with me.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Shifu leads Po through the mountains.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I know you're trying to be all mystical and kung fu-y, but could you at least tell me where we're going?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Shifu just continues walking.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Shifu is sitting beneath a tree. Winded and wheezing, Po slowly works his way up the hill.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Po sets his gear down and looks around. Shifu breathes in morning mist as Po approaches.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You dragged me all the way out here for a bath?!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Po begins to pat his armpits with water.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Panda, we do not wash our pits in The Pool of Sacred Tears.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Po quickly stops. Realizing.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (in awe) The pool of...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: This is where Oogway unravelled the mysteries of harmony and focus. This is the birthplace of Kung Fu.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The camera cranes up to reveal they are standing on rock shapes that resemble a yin yang symbol.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: As the camera pulls further out, it pulls back through a vision of Oogway doing Kung Fu moves.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: FLASH FRAME -- Shifu leaps atop one of the rocks and look down at Po.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Do you want to learn Kung Fu?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (awestruck) Yeah...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Then I am your master!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Okay!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Tears of joy well up in Po's eyes.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Don't cry.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Okay.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Po sniffs the tears back and smiles.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Shifu leads Po out into an open field.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: When you focus on Kung Fu, when you concentrate...you stink.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Po scowls.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: But perhaps that is my fault. I cannot train you the way I have trained the Five. I now see that the way to get through to you is with this!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Shifu produces a bowl of dumplings.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Oh great, `cause I'm hungry.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Good. When you have been trained, you may eat. Let us begin.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Po's training unfolds -- deep breathing exercises, balanc tests, push ups, sit ups, climbing, etc. Through it all, never gets to eat, although he does indeed learn kung fu.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Shifu sets a bowl of dumplings on a boulder.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: After you, panda.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Po stops short, suspicious.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Just like that? No situps? No ten mile hike?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I vowed to train you... and you have been trained. You are free to eat.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Po grabs one of the dumplings in his chopsticks.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Enjoy.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Po raises the dumpling to his mouth. WHOOSH! Shifu snatch the dumpling away and eats it himself.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hey!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I said you are free to eat. Have a dumpling.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Po reaches again as Shifu leaps across the table and kick the dumpling into the air.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hey!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Shifu eats it and Po scowls.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You are free to eat!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (upset) Am I?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (challenging) Are you?!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Po and Shifu ready their chopsticks. Po slams the table a sends the bowl of dumplings airborne. Back and forth, Po Shifu spar, vying for the dumplings. Until there is only left.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Shifu tries every trick to keep the dumpling away from Po hides it underneath one of the bowls. He uses his chopsti as weapons to smack Po's chopsticks away. He attacks Po w his bamboo staff.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: But Po skillfully manages to best Shifu for the final dumpling.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Shifu smiles. Po has passed the final test.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: But then Po tosses the dumpling into Shifu's open hand.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'm not hungry... master.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Master and pupil bow to each other.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Five race toward a rope bridge stretched between moun peaks.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Tai Lung appears at the other end of the bridge. He ROARS races toward them.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Cut it!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The others slash at the ropes securing the bridge to the mountain. Tai Lung is almost upon them when Tigress cuts final rope. But Tai Lung is too close -- Tigress must lau herself into him. The two cats end up in the middle of th bridge just as it starts to tumble into the canyon below. Five grab support ropes and hold on for dear life.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Where's the Dragon Warrior?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: How do you know you're not looking at her?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Tai Lung laughs. It echoes off the mountain walls.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You think I'm a fool? I know you're not the Dragon Warrior. None of you!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Five exchange quick, worried looks.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (nodding confidently) I heard how he fell out of the sky on a ball of fire, that he's a warrior unlike anything the world has ever seen.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Five exchange quick, confused looks.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Po?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: So that is his name -- Po. Finally, a worthy opponent. Our battle will be legendary!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Tigress charges at him. The battle begins. Tigress punche Tai Lung as he hangs from the bridge. But Tai Lung counte with a maneuver that sends Tigress slamming backwards thr the bridge's wooden slats. Then Tigress gets choked by th bridge's ropes. Monkey turns to Crane and Viper.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We've got this. Help her!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Viper grabs Tai Lung, which causes him to let go of the ropes. Tigress plummets down into the gorge... but Crane manages to catch her. Viper punches Tai Lung repeatedly w his own fist. Tai Lung manages to get a paw around Viper' "throat".

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Monkey!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ANGLE ON MANTIS AND MONKEY. Mantis is straining to hold t rope by himself.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Go! (then) Ack! What was I thinking?!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Monkey leaps into action, kicking Tai Lung in the chest a sending him crashing through the slats of the bridge. He back to his feet and starts running back to them on a sin strand of rope.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Mantis!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Mantis whips his end of the rope, sending a sine wave shooting toward Tai Lung. The rope whips Tai Lung in the and he gets tangled up. The Five see their chance.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Now!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Working as a team, the Five kick Tai Lung's butt every wh way. Tigress finally slashes the last rope holding up Tai Lung. He plummets down... down... disappearing into the m Mantis whips his end of the rope, returning his buddies safely to the mountain.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Five look relieved. But the relief is short-lived...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Tigress notices that the other end of the bridge is circl the far mountain peak. Her eyes go wide with dread. The r whips up. But Tai Lung isn't there.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: With a crash, he suddenly appears behind the Five.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Shifu taught you well...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Tai Lung jabs a finger at Monkey, who instantly freezes.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: But he didn't teach you everything.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Tai lung lunges toward the rest.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Shifu and Po walk through the palace courtyard. Po has an easy spring in his step.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You have done well, Panda.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Done well? Done well?! I've done awesome!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He swings his belly around and knocks Shifu off balance.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Shifu staggers back, regaining his dignity.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The mark of a true hero is humility!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: After a moment's thought, though, he leans toward Po -

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: But yes...you have done awesome.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: And he punches him playfully on the arm. Po smiles at him they LAUGH, an indistinct figure appears in the clouds be them. IT'S CRANE!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Crane carries the five to the palace grounds, crashing in heap.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Huh? Guys? Guys!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Po throws his backpack aside and runs over to them.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They're dead? No, they're breathing! They're asleep?! No, their eyes are open.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Crane struggles to lift his head.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We were no match for his nerve attack.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: His head collapses to the ground.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He has gotten stronger.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Who? Tai Lung? Stronger?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Shifu starts freeing the Five. First Viper, then Mantis, Monkey releases suddenly from his paralysis -

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He's too fast!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He delivers a Kung Fu punch to Po's head and then slowly realizes where he is.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Sorry, Po.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Shifu kneels before Tigress and works to free her.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I thought we could stop him.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He could have killed you.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Why didn't he?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: So you could come back here and strike fear into our hearts. But it won't work!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Uh, it might, I mean, a little. I'm pretty scared.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You can defeat him, panda.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Are you kidding? If they can't-- They're five masters. I'm just one me.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: But you will have the one thing that no one else does.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: CLOSE-UP of the Dragon Scroll. Po stares at Shifu - then looks up at the Scroll. Then back at Shifu -

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You really believe I'm ready?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You are, Po.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They look at each other. This is a big moment.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Oogway's staff hangs in a rack surrounded by candles. As and The Five stand by, Shifu carries the staff over to th reflecting pool. Shifu bows his head, then, eyes still closed, he raises the staff up above his head. Po and the others watch, expectantly. The peach blossom petals rise flickering, spinning cloud up from the pool. The gentle tornado rises up around the ceiling carving that holds th Dragon Scroll. The petals loosen the scroll from the drag mouth and it falls. At the last second, Shifu reaches out with the staff to catch the scroll on the end of it. He t to Po, holding it out.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Behold. The Dragon Scroll... It is yours.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Wait, what happens when I read it?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No one knows, but legend says you will be able to hear a butterfly's wing-beat.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Whoa! Really? That's cool.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yes. And see light in the deepest cave. You will feel the universe in motion around you.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Wow! Can I punch through walls? Can I do a quadruple back flip? Will I have invisibility--

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Focus. Focus.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Huh? Oh, yeah... yeah.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Read it, Po, and fulfill your destiny. Read it and become... the Dragon Warrior!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Whooaa!!!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Po takes a deep breath. Then he grasps the tube and tries pull the top off it. It doesn't budge. He strains at it.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It's impossible to open.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He strains again. He tries to bite it off...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Come on baby. Come on now...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Shifu SIGHS and holds out his hand. Po passes him the tub Shifu pops the end off effortlessly and passes it back to

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Thank you. I probably loosened it up for you though... Okay, here goes.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He glances at the Five. They look on in awe. Monkey gives the `thumbs up.' Po starts to unroll the scroll, the gold light bathing his face. Across the scroll we see Shifu, excited that he is witness to history...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: On Po's face as he finishes opening the scroll.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Then -

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: AAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAA!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Shifu looks concerned. The Five look concerned. Po looks utterly terrified.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It's blank!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Here! Look!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Po tries to show Shifu the scroll. Shifu covers his eyes turns his head away.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No! I am forbidden to look upon--

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: But he can't help himself. He takes a peek. Then he GRABS off Po. He turns it around, then upside down. He closes i and opens it again, astonished.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Blank? I don't...I don't understand.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Shifu turns away, contemplative. What can this mean?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Okay. So like, Oogway was just a crazy old turtle after all?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No. Oogway was wiser than us all.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Po sits heavily on the floor, dejected.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Oh, come on! Face it. He picked me by accident. Of course I'm not the Dragon Warrior. Who am I kidding?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Five don't argue.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: But who will stop Tai Lung?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He'll destroy everything...and everyone.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Shifu puts the scroll back in its container and seals it. looks oddly calm as he turns around.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No, evacuate the Valley. You must protect the villagers from Tai Lung's rage.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What about you master?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I will fight him.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I can hold him off long enough for everyone to escape.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: But Shifu, he'll kill you.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Then I will finally have paid for my mistake.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Five and Po look devastated.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Listen to me, all of you. It is time for you to continue your journey without me. I am very proud to have been your master.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Shifu salutes them and turns away. Po is heartbroken. Cra steps forward and kindly puts a wing around Po, pulling a

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Po resists for a moment, then lets the Five lead him off.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Five arrive at the base of the stairs.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We've got to get them out safely.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Monkey picks up a small child.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Come, little one. Let's find your mama.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Viper, gather the southern farmers. Mantis, the north. Crane, light the way.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They split up and begin helping the villagers evacuate. P left by himself.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He makes his way through the bustling town.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (skeptically) Look, it's the Dragon Warrior.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Po approaches the Noodle Shop.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hey, Dad.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Po!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Seeing Po, Po's Dad hurries over and wraps his arms aroun his son. Po bends down to reciprocate the hug, as Po's da pulls away, having fastened an apron around Po's waist.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Good to have you back, son!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (listlessly) Good to be back.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Po's Dad goes back to packing things up.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Let's go Po. So, for our next shop, it's time to face it -- the future of noodles is dice-cut vegetables, no longer slices.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Dad starts to walk off, unaware that Po isn't following.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Also, I was thinking, maybe this time we'll have a kitchen you can actually stand up in. Hmm? You like that?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He turns and notices that Po hasn't moved. He walks to Po sympathetically.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Po, I'm sorry things didn't work out. It just... wasn't meant to be.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Po slumps against the cart.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Po, forget everything else. Your destiny still awaits. We are noodle folk -- broth runs deep through our veins.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I don't know, Dad. Honestly, sometimes I can't believe I'm actually your son.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Dad is taken aback.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Po, I think it's time I told you something I should have told you a long time ago...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Okay.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Dad pauses dramatically.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The secret ingredient of my secret ingredient soup!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Po feigns excitement.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Oh.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: C'mere! The secret ingredient is... nothing!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Huh?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You heard me. Nothing. There is no secret ingredient!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Wait wait...it's just plain old noodle soup? You don't add some kind of special sauce or something?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Don't have to. To make something special, you just have to believe it's special.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Po looks at his father with dawning realization. He picks the Scroll.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: For a moment, Po stares at his reflection on the scroll, he smiles serenely. He gets it now.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: There is no secret ingredient...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Po turns back to look at the palace.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: At the top of the stairs, Shifu looks upon the Valley, awaiting his fate. With a gust of wind, Tai Lung appears before him.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I have come home, Master.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: This is no longer your home. And I am no longer your master.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yes. You have a new favorite. So where is this...Po? Did I scare him off?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: This battle is between you and me.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: So. That is how it's going to be?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: That is how it must be.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They fight. At last. Tai Lung punches Shifu clean through doors of the Jade Palace.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Tai Lung enters.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I rotted in jail for twenty years because of your weakness!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Obeying your master is not weakness!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You knew I was the Dragon Warrior! You always knew...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Dissolve to FLASHBACK.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A young Tai Lung looks expectant. Oogway shakes his head.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: But when Oogway said otherwise, what did you do? What did you do?!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Tai Lung looks to Shifu who averts his eyes and the past dissolves into the present.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: NOTHING!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Shifu takes a Kung Fu stance.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You were not meant to be the Dragon Warrior! That was not my fault!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: NOT YOUR FAULT?!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Enraged, Tai Lung knocks over the Kung Fu artifacts and throws them at Shifu.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: WHO FILLED MY HEAD WITH DREAMS?! WHO DROVE ME TO TRAIN UNTIL MY BONES CRACKED?! WHO DENIED ME MY DESTINY?!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Shifu dodges each attack.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It was never my decision to make!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Tai Lung pulls Oogway's staff from the shrine.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It is now.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They fight. Tai Lung pins Shifu down with the staff.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Give me the scroll!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I would rather die.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They struggle for a beat until finally, the staff splinte into a hundred pieces. Shifu looks back at the pieces and flutter of peach tree petals fly by. Caught off guard, Sh gets kicked by Tai Lung into a column.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Shifu climbs the column to the rafters. Tai Lung follows sends them both crashing through the roof.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Lightning flash.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Grappling in mid-air, Tai Lung gets his hands around Shif throat as they crash back through the roof.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They kick apart. Shifu crashes to the floor and lands har Tai Lung bounces off the wall and throws a lantern to the floor. Flames go everywhere. Tai Lung's arms are aflame a charges at Shifu.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: All I ever did, I did to make you proud! Tell me how proud you are, Shifu! Tell me! TELL ME!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: THOOM! A fiery punch sends Shifu skidding across the floo and crashing against the reflecting pool. The flames extinguish and Tai Lung extends his claws.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (weakly) I have always been proud of you. From the first moment, I've been proud of you. And it was my pride that blinded me. I loved you too much to see what you were becoming. What I was turning you into. I'm... sorry.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Tai Lung stops in his tracks. Shifu waits. Tai Lung's expression goes cold. He grabs Shifu by the throat.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I don't want your apology. I want my scroll!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He holds Shifu up to the ceiling. Looking up, Tai Lung bristles when he sees the scroll is missing.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: WHAT? WHERE IS IT?!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Tai Lung slams Shifu to the floor.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (weakly) Dragon Warrior has taken scroll halfway across China by now. You will never see that scroll, Tai Lung. Never. Never...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Tai Lung is furious. He roars, ready to strike Shifu. Suddenly...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hey!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Tai Lung turns around to find Po standing in the doorway.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (out of breath) Stairs...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Tai Lung casts Shifu aside.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Who are you?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Buddy, I am the Dragon Warrior. (exhales hard) Huhhh...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You?! Him?! (to Shifu) He's a panda. (back to Po) You're a panda. What are you gonna do, big guy? Sit on me?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Don't tempt me. Haha. No. I'm gonna use this. You want it? Come and get it.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Po shows him the Dragon Scroll.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: From out of nowhere, Tai Lung appears and punches Po acro the room, grabbing the scroll knocked from Po's hands.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Finally!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Po bounces off a nearby pillar and slams back into Tai Lu sending him flying into a column. Po puts on a brave face strikes a pose as Tai Lung recovers and charges. Po turns run.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Tai Lung quickly catches up and they both sail off the Pa steps.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Po clings to the scroll as Tai Lung delivers a kick and s him crashing onto the theater rooftops below.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Po rolls down off a tree and uses the recoil to whip back smash Tai Lung. He briefly skids across the rooftop and c right back at Po.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: That scroll is mine!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Down the Theater steps, Po and Tai Lung grapple for the scroll. Po is oblivious to the effects of crashing down stairs and in slow motion, his voluminous butt presses do on Tai Lung's head. As they crash through the Gateway the scroll is knocked loose. Tai Lung goes for the scroll but snatches it away using a noodle lasso. The scroll flies towards him and bounces off his head. Tai Lung leaps for but Po grabs his tail and pulls him back down onto a cart which see-saws Po into the air. In mid-air, Po slurps the noodle.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Up and over the rooftops, Po lands in a grove of bamboo t and into a nearby wok shop. The scroll rolls to a stop in street.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: As Tai Lung makes his move on the scroll, Po turns the ar of overturned woks into a shell game, sliding the woks ar to hide the scroll.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Lightning!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Tai Lung knocks the woks away and exposes the scroll as P uses his bamboo stilts to block Tai Lung. The leopard swi out the stilts and brings Po down on top of him as the sc rolls down the steps towards the river.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Po gets thrown into a fireworks booth. As Tai Lung chases down the scroll, he turns back to see Po flying through t fireworks-filled sky.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Po slams through Tai Lung and crashes into a rock wall. T scroll flies out of his hand and lands in the mouth of an ornamental rooftop dragon. He looks back at Tai Lung, who sees where the scroll has landed. Via the magic of cookie vision, Po effortlessly scales the building. Tai Lung is shocked.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The scroll has given him power. (then) NOOO0!!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He takes a giant leap and kicks the wall. The resulting shockwave collapses the building.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Amazingly, Po skips across the falling roof tiles to reac the scroll in mid-air as Tai Lung leaps up behind him and unleashes a punishing blow that sends Po smashing into th ground. As Tai Lung lands, he delivers a final devastatin punch.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: As the dust settles, Tai Lung is looming over Po in the impact crater.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (out of breath) Finally... oh yes... the power of the Dragon Scroll... is mine!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Tai Lung grabs for the scroll and opens it. His face fall

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It's NOTHING!!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Po stirs.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It's okay. I didn't get it the first time either.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (disbelief) What?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Po gets to his feet.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: There is no secret ingredient. It's just you.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Tai Lung snarls and lunges at Po.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: RRRAAAH!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: AAAAGGGHH!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Tai Lung attacks Po's nerve points. But Po begins gigglin

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Stop! Stop it! I'm gonna pee! Don't! Don't!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Tai Lung's nerve attack has no effect on Po. Frustrated, delivers a double-fisted punch to Po's belly.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The shockwave ripples through Po's entire body and Po's a come back and strike Tai Lung, sending the leopard crashi back into a building. Po looks at his hands, amazed at wh he just did.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Tai Lung rises from the rubble and runs at Po again. But strikes back, using an unorthodox panda-style technique, getting Tai Lung to chomp down on his own tail. Po gives Lung a butt bump that sends him crashing into a building. Lung emerges and attempts one more lunge at Po. But Po prepares... and Tai Lung is swiftly met by Po's IRON BELL He is launched into the air. Po waits... and waits... unt finally, Tai Lung appears in the sky and crashes to the ground.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Tai Lung is battered, but still defiant.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (heavy breathing) You... can't defeat me. You're just a big, fat panda!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: SCHWING! Po grabs Tai Lung's finger. Tai Lung's eyes go w

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'm not a big, fat panda. I'm the big, fat panda.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Po's pinky pops up. Tai Lung gasps.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Wuxi Finger Hold!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Oh, you know this hold?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You're bluffing. You're bluffing! Shifu didn't teach you that.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Nope. I figured it out.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He flexes his pinky...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Skadoosh!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A mushroom cloud appears over the Valley, sweeping past t Furious Five and the fleeing villagers.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Villagers emerge from hiding. Po walks out from the mist looking very much like the warrior from the opening dream

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Look! The Dragon Warrior.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: As he nears, we see that his hat is an upside down wok an his scarf is a torn apron.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Villagers CHEER the Dragon Warrior. Po's Dad emerges from crowd.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: That's my boy. That big, lovely kung fu warrior is my son!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Thanks, Dad.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Po hugs his dad. The wok falls off Po's head and rolls on ground until Mantis appears in frame and stops it. The re of the Five are with him. Po takes notice.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hey, guys.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Master.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Tigress bows deeply. The others follow.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Master.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (modest) Master? (then, remembering) Master Shifu!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Po races toward the Jade Palace. He climbs the steps. The more steps.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Po arrives breathless at the Jade Palace. Shifu is still lying in the scroll room, his eyes closed. Po rushes to h side.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Master! Shifu! Shifu! Are you okay?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Shifu weakly opens his eyes.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Po! You're alive! (then, darkly) Or we're both dead.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No, Master, I didn't die. I defeated Tai Lung!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You did?!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Shifu smiles and shakes his head in disbelief.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Wow. It is as Oogway foretold -- You are the Dragon Warrior. You have brought peace to this Valley. And to me. Thank you. Thank you, Po. Thank you...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Shifu closes his eyes. He is still. Po starts freaking ou

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No! Master! No No No! Don't die, Shifu. Please...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (eyes snapping open) I'm not dying, you idiot-- ah, Dragon Warrior. I'm simply at peace. Finally.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Oh. So, um, I should...stop talking?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: If you can.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Po nods reverently as Shifu closes his eyes again. Master pupil lie next to each other. The camera pulls up and bac away from them. Po tries to remain still, but it's hard.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He's about to say something, but he stops himself. He fid for a beat, then can't control himself any longer.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Want to get something to eat?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (sighs) Yeah.
